channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: Prague astronomical clock
item.description: The Prague astronomical clock or Prague Orloj (Czech: Pražský orloj [praʃskiː orloj]) is a medieval astronomical clock attached to the Old Town Hall in Prague, the capital of the Czech Republic. The clock was first installed in 1410, making it the third-oldest astronomical clock in the world and the oldest clock still in operation.
